DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_cold_snap_: When damaged, will take additional damage and will be frozen briefly.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_ghost_walk: Invisible, movement speed changed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and slowing nearby enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_tornado_De: Swept up in a tornado. Invulnerable but cannot act. Will take damage upon landing.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_alacrity_D: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_ice_wall_s: Slowed by the wall of ice.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_deafening_: Reeling back from the deafening blast.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_curse_of_: Taking damage and slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Duration increases when casting a spell.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_armlet_unholy:
Damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE%.
Strength increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS%.
Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Losing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% health per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_assault_posit: Armor enhanced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.\nAttack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_boots_of_travel_in: An ally is teleporting to your location.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_phase_boots_a: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and allows you to move through units.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bottle_regeneratio: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ethereal_blad: Ethereal Form. Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%% increased magic damage and cannot attack or be attacked.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ghost_state_Descri: Ethereal Form. Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%% increased magic damage and cannot attack or be attacked.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_invisibility_: Invisible as the wind. Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and you can move through units. Attacking to break invisibility will deal 175 bonus damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mask_of_madne: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% but reduces armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% and silences you.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mjollnir_stat: When attacked, there is a %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% chance that lightning will strike attacker and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% other nearby enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_orb_of_venom_: Taking %poison_damage_melee% poison damage per second and moving %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% more slowly.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_pipe_barrier_: Magic shield that blocks %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_SPELL_DAMAGE_CONSTANT% incoming magic damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_radiance_debu: Taking 60 damage per second, and missing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% of attacks.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sange_buff_Descrip: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sange_and_yasha_bu: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_eul_cyclone_Descri: Swept up in a cyclone, you are invulnerable and unable to act.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sheepstick_debuff_: You are a pig. Cannot attack or cast spells.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_shivas_guard_: Attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and regeneration by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_LIFESTEAL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_skadi_slow_De: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_soul_ring_buf: Mana increased at the cost of health. Extra mana will be lost at the end of Sacrifice's duration.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ancient_jangg: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.\nAttack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_smoke_of_deceit_De: Invisible, moving %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% faster, and hidden from the minimap. Attacking or moving within %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% range of an enemy hero or tower will break the invisibility.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_desolator_buff_Des: Desolator attacks reduced your armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
DOTA_Tooltip_rune_invisibility_descripti: Become invisible for 45 seconds.  This invisibility is broken by attacking or by using an ability or item.
DOTA_Tooltip_rune_regeneration_descripti: Regenerates health and mana to maximum.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_regen_Descrip: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_dustofappeara: Can be seen by enemies and slowed when invisible. Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lina_fiery_soul_De: Attack Speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and Movement Speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_fatal_bond: Distributing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% of all damage to linked units
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_shadow_wor: Taking periodic damage if an enemy, and periodic heal if a friend.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_golem_perm: Taking damage while near the golem
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kobold_taskmaster_s: The Kobold Foreman's cruel efficiency increases his movement speed and the movement speed of all nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_khan_endura: The fearsome Hellbear Smasher attacks more quickly and bullies nearby allies into following suit.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_khan_war_st: The Centaur Conqueror's powerful hooves stomp the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemies. Heroes recover more quickly.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gnoll_assassin_enve: The Vhoul Assassin has soaked his weapons in his own blend of painful predator venoms. Heroes recover from the poison more quickly.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ghost_frost_attack_: The Ghost launches an eerie attack that chills her enemies to their bones.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ghost_frost_attack: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_polar_furbolg_ursa_: The Hellbear Smasher claps his massive hands together, creating a deafening blast. The blast damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_polar_furbolg_ursa: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_neutral_spell_immun: This creature does not feel the effects of most magical spells.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_frost_arm: The Ogre Frostmage summons an invisible layer of icy air that surrounds the target friendly unit, increasing its armor and temporarily slowing any enemies that dare attack it.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_frost_ar: Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%. Enemy melee units that attack will suffer reduced movement and attack speed.
Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_troll_warlord_: The Dark Troll Summoner tosses netting around an enemy's feet, briefly immobilizing the unit, though the unit can still attack and use abilities.
The Dark Troll Summoner stirs the ground underfoot, raising the remains of trolls long dead, bringing to life two skeleton Warriors who will fight at his side.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_giant_wolf_critical: The Giant Wolf's ferocious attacks occasionally tear a vital tendon, inflicting critical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf_critical: The cruel Alpha Wolf attacks his enemy's unprotected vitals at every opportunity, inflicting critical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf_command_: The Alpha Wolf's ruthless attacks do extra damage. His commanding presence inspires nearby allies to attack ruthlessly as well.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tornado_tempest_Des: The Tornado's overpowering winds slow all nearby enemies, flinging debris at them and inflicting damage every second. Enemies closer to the center of the Tornado take more damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tornado_tempest_de: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%. Taking damage per second based on proximity to the Tornado.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_tor: CHANNELED - The Wildwing Ripper calls on the spirit of the wind, creating a sentient Tornado that he can control. The Tornado slows nearby enemies and does damage. It is invulnerable and can move anywhere.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_tou: The Wildwing Ripper's fury numbs it to attacks and inspires nearby allies to withstand more blows.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_trickster_pur: The Satyr Banisher knows every trick in the book, allowing him to remove debuffs from allies or buffs from enemies. His trickery also slows the enemy's movement.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_soulstealer_m: The Satyr Mindstealer removes a fragment of his enemy's soul, burning away some mana and dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hellcaller_sh: The Satyr Tormenter tears open an unstable rift to the underworld, creating a shockwave that travels in a line along the ground, dealing damage to enemies it hits.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hellcaller_un: The Satyr Tormenter's demonic communion allows him to emanate regenerative power, increasing the health regeneration of himself and all nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_satyr_hellcaller_u: Health regeneration increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% per second.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_troll_high_p: The Hill Troll Priest lays his holy blessing upon the target ally, replenishing some health.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_harpy_storm_chain_l: The Harpy Stormcrafter releases a high-voltage bolt of electricity at the target enemy, dealing damage. The bolt jumps to other nearby enemies, losing power with each jump.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_splash: The Black Dragon's explosive attacks are felt by all nearby enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_so: The Drakken Sentinel has assumed a partially ethereal form, making him difficult to hit with attacks.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_ov: The Drakken Armorer moves about quickly, making him difficult to hit with attacks.
The Drakken Armorer is wholly devoted to his cause, increasing his tolerance for physical attacks. Nearby allies are similarly devoted to the Overseer and are able to withstand more blows.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: The Ancient Thunderhide slams his mammoth body against the ground. The shock damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing. Heroes regain their balance more quickly.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thunder_lizard: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: The Ancient Thunderhide works an ally into a frenzy, causing his ally to have increased attack speed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis_Descript:
Passive: Reincarnation

Brings you to life with full health and mana %reincarnate_time% seconds after you die, at the location where you died.

Reincarnation must be used within %disappear_time_minutes_tooltip% minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis_Lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_ring_De:
Active: Replenish Mana

Restores %mana_restore% mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: %radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Descrip:
Toggle: Unholy Strength

When active, Unholy Strength grants +%unholy_bonus_damage% damage, +%unholy_bonus_strength% strength and +%unholy_bonus_armor% armor, but drains %unholy_health_drain_per_second% health per second.

You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Descri:
Passive: Assault Aura

Grants %aura_attack_speed% attack speed and %aura_positive_armor% armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by %aura_negative_armor%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Descrip:
Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_belt_of_streng: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Descript:
Active: Chop Tree

Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %quelling_bonus% for melee heroes, and %quelling_bonus_ranged% for ranged. \n

Passive: Cleave

Deals %cleave_damage_percent%%% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to %cleave_distance% around the target. Deals %cleave_damage_percent_creep%%% against creeps. (Melee Only)
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_black_king_bar:
Active: Avatar

Grants Spell Immunity. Duration decreases with each use.

Duration: %duration%
Dispel Type:
A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Des:
Active: Damage Return

For %duration% seconds, the damage returned from all sources is increased by %active_reflection_pct%%%.\n

Passive: Damage Return

Everytime you are attacked, you return %passive_reflection_constant% damage plus %passive_reflection_pct%%% of the attack damage dealt to you.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Lor: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blades_of_atta: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_of_alacr: A long blade imbued with time magic.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Descript:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.

Blink Dagger cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Des:
Active: Bloodpact

Converts %mana_cost_percentage%%% of your max mana to health regeneration over %restore_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Mana Battery

Each charge provides %regen_per_charge% MP regen and %amp_per_charge%%% Spell Amp. Nearby kills provide %kill_charges% charges. Dying causes you to lose %death_charges% charges. Starts with %initial_charges_tooltip% charges.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Lor: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots_of_elves: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Descrip:
Active: Regenerate

Consumes a charge to restore %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana over %restore_time% seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Store Rune

Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bracer_Lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branches_Lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_broadsword_Lor: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckler_Descri:
Passive: Buckler Aura

Grants %bonus_aoe_armor% armor to allied player units.

Radius: %bonus_aoe_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckler_Lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_butterfly_Lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_chainmail_Lore: A medium weave of metal chains.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cheese_Descrip:
Use: Fondue

Instantly restores %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cheese_Lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_circlet_Lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clarity_Descri:
Use: Replenish

Grants %mana_regen% mana regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clarity_Lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_claymore_Lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cloak_Lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_courier_Descri:
Use: Deploy Courier

Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_courier_Lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flying_courier:
Use: Upgrade Courier

Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.

Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Descri:
Active: Cyclone

Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take %tooltip_drop_damage% magical damage upon landing.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Dispel Type:
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_Descript:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_2_Descri:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_2_Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_3_Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_4_Descri:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_4_Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_5_Descri:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_5_Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_demon_edge_Lor: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_Desc:
Passive: Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_Lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffusal_blade:
Active: Inhibit

Targets an enemy, slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana.

Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.
An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

Active: Purge

Targets an enemy, removing buffs from the target and slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana.

Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.

Dispel Type:
An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_Descripti:
Use: Reveal

Reveals and slows invisible heroes by %movespeed%%% in a %radius% radius around the caster for %duration% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_eagle_Lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_energy_booster: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade:
Active: Ether Blast

Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for %duration_ally% seconds on allies and %duration% seconds on enemies.

Enemy targets are also slowed by %blast_movement_slow%%%, and take %blast_agility_multiplier%x your primary attribute + %blast_damage_base% as magical damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask_Descript:
Use: Salve

Grants %health_regen% health regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask_Lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_De:
Active: Force

Pushes any target unit %push_length% units in the direction it is facing.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_Lo: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gauntlets_Lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_Descriptio:
Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %radius% range of its carrier. \n

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Descript:
Active: Ghost Form

You enter ghost form for %duration% seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and %extra_spell_damage_percent%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gloves_Lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_D:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_L: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_of_midas_:
Active: Transmute

Kills a non-hero target for %bonus_gold% gold and %xp_multiplier%x experience.

Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Desc:
Passive: Regeneration Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heart_Lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_iron_w: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_the_do:
Active: Dominate

Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to %speed_base% and max health to a minimum of %health_min%. Also provides the unit with +%creep_bonus_damage% base attack damage, +%creep_bonus_hp_regen% health regen, +%creep_bonus_mp_regen% mana regen and +%creep_bonus_armor% armor.

Dominated units with a max health of greater than %health_min% retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to %bounty_gold% gold.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hood_of_defian: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hyperstone_Lor: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_De:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus physical damage on that attack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_Lo: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javelin_Descri:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javelin_Lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_De:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_Lo: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifesteal_Desc:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifesteal_Lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sphere_Descrip:
Passive: Spellblock

Blocks most targeted spells once every %block_cooldown% seconds.\n

Active: Transfer Spellblock

Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for %block_cooldown% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sphere_Lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maelstrom_Desc:
Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maelstrom_Lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_De:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_Lo: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Des:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Lor: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Descript:
Active: Mirror Image

Creates %images_count% images of your hero that last %tooltip_illusion_duration% seconds.

Melee images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_melee%%% damage, while Ranged images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_ranged%%%. Illusions take %tooltip_damage_incoming_total_pct%%% damage.

Dispel Type:
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mantle_Lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mask_of_madnes:
Active: Berserk

Gives %berserk_bonus_attack_speed% attack speed and %berserk_bonus_movement_speed% movement speed, but reduces your armor by %berserk_armor_reduction% and silences you. Lasts %berserk_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Descri:
Active: Restore

Heals %heal_amount% health to allied units in a %heal_radius% radius.\n

Passive: Mekansm Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allied units in a %aura_radius% radius.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mithril_hammer: A hammer forged of pure mithril.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Descr:
Active: Static Charge

Places a charged shield on a target unit for %static_duration% seconds which has a %static_chance%%% chance to release a %static_damage% magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and %static_strikes% additional enemies.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_monkey_king_ba:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage.
A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mystic_staff_L: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for %summon_duration% seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: %warrior_health_tooltip%
Damage: %warrior_damage_tooltip%
Mana Break Damage: %warrior_mana_break_tooltip%
Last Will Damage: %explosion%

Archer:

Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Health: %archer_health_tooltip%
Damage: %archer_damage_tooltip%
Aura Move Speed: %archer_move_speed%
Aura Radius: %archer_aura_radius_tooltip%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necronomicon_L: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_null_talisman_: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_oblivion_staff: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary staff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ogre_axe_Lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orchid_Descrip:
Active: Soul Burn

Silences the target unit for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, %silence_damage_percent%%% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orchid_Lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pers_Lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phase_boots_De:
Active: Phase

Gives %phase_movement_speed%%% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and %phase_movement_speed_range%%% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for %phase_duration% seconds.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phase_boots_Lo: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_Descripti:
Active: Barrier

Gives a shield that blocks %barrier_block% magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.

Radius: %barrier_radius%\n

Passive: Insight Aura

Gives allied units %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %magic_resistance_aura%%% magic resistance.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_Lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_platemail_Lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_poor_mans_shie:
Passive: Damage Block

Gives a 100% chance to block %damage_block_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %damage_block_ranged% damage on ranged.

Has a %block_chance%%% chance to block damage from creeps.
A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power_treads_D:
Active: Switch Attribute

Switches between +%bonus_stat% Strength, +%bonus_stat% Agility, or +%bonus_stat% Intelligence.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power_treads_L: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quarterstaff_L: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quelling_blade:
Active: Chop Tree

Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %damage_bonus% for melee heroes, and %damage_bonus_ranged% for ranged.
The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_radiance_Descr:
Toggle: Burn

When active, scorches enemies for %aura_damage% magical damage per second, and causes them to miss %blind_pct%%% of their attacks. Illusions deal %aura_damage_illusions% magical damage per second.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_radiance_Lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapier_Descrip:
Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapier_Lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_reaver_Lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_refresher_Desc:
Active: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_refresher_Lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_relic_Lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_basili:
Passive: Basilius Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_health: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_protec: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_regen_: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_robe_Lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sange_Lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sange_and_yash: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_satanic_Descri:
Active: Unholy Rage

Increases Lifesteal percentage to %unholy_lifesteal_total_tooltip%%% for %unholy_duration% seconds.

Dispel Type:
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_satanic_Lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheepstick_Des:
Active: Hex

Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for %sheep_duration% seconds. The target has a base movement speed of %sheep_movement_speed% and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheepstick_Lor: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shivas_guard_D:
Active: Arctic Blast

Emits a freezing wave that deals %blast_damage% magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by %blast_movement_speed%%% for %blast_debuff_duration% seconds.

Radius: %blast_radius%\n

Passive: Freezing Aura

Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by %aura_attack_speed% and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by %hp_regen_degen_aura%%%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shivas_guard_L: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_skadi_Descript:
Passive: Cold Attack

Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed and reduces heals, health regeneration, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by %heal_reduction%%% for %cold_duration% seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by %cold_slow_ranged%%% movement speed and by %cold_slow_ranged% attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by %cold_slow_melee%%% movement speed and by %cold_slow_melee% attack speed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_skadi_Lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_slippers_Lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sobi_mask_Lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_ring_Desc:
Active: Sacrifice

Consume %health_sacrifice% health to temporarily gain %mana_gain% mana. Lasts %duration% seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_ring_Lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_staff_of_wizar: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout_shield_D:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %damage_block_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %damage_block_ranged% damage on ranged.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout_shield_L: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_talisman_of_ev: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tango_Descript:
Use: Devour

Consumes a target tree to gain %health_regen% health regeneration for %buff_duration% seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with %tooltip_charges% charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tango_Lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscroll_Descr:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for %tooltip_channel_time% seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_travel_boots_D:
Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll

Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage. \nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ultimate_orb_L: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ultimate_scept:
Passive: Ability Upgrade

Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_urn_of_shadows:
Active: Soul Release

Provides %soul_heal_amount% health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals %soul_damage_amount% damage per second when cast on enemies.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within %soul_radius% units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%
Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vanguard_Descr:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vanguard_Lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vladmir_Descri:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura

Grants %lifesteal_aura%%% lifesteal, %damage_aura%%% bonus damage, %mana_regen_aura% mana regeneration, and %armor_aura% armor to nearby allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vladmir_Lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_observer_:
Use: Plant

Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a %vision_range_tooltip% radius to your team. Lasts %duration_minutes_tooltip% minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_sentry_De:
Use: Plant

Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a %true_sight_range% radius.
Lasts %duration_minutes_tooltip% minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_wraith_band_Lo: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_yasha_Lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_boots_D:
Active: Replenish Mana

Restores %replenish_amount% mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: %replenish_radius%\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_boots_L: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orb_of_venom_D:
Passive: Poison Attack

Poisons the target, dealing %poison_damage_melee% magical damage per second and slowing movement by %poison_movement_speed_melee%%% if the equipped hero is melee, or by %poison_movement_speed_range%%% if they are ranged. Lasts for %poison_duration% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orb_of_venom_L: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ancient_janggo:
Active: Endurance

Consumes a charge and gives +%bonus_attack_speed_pct% attack speed and +%bonus_movement_speed_pct%%% movement speed to nearby allies for %duration% seconds.

Comes with %charges_tooltip% charges.

Radius: %radius% \n\n

Passive: Swiftness Aura

Grants %aura_movement_speed% movement speed to allies.

Radius: %radius%
A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_medallion_of_c:
Active: Valor

If cast on an ally, grants them the %bonus_armor% armor, and removing it from the caster.

If cast on an enemy, reduces %bonus_armor% armor on both the enemy and the caster.

Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
The bearer has no fear of combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_smoke_of_decei:
Use: Disguise

Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a %application_radius% radius invisible, and grants %bonus_movement_speed%%% bonus movement speed for %duration% seconds.

Attacking, or moving within %visibility_radius% range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.

Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_veil_of_discor:
Active: Magic Weakness

Cast a %debuff_radius% radius blast that causes enemy heroes to take %spell_amp%%% increased damage from spells.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Duration: %resist_debuff_duration% seconds. \n\n

Passive: Basilius Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_st: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_ph: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_bl: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_co: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_hellf: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_vampi: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_reinc: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_waveform_: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_agi: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_str: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_replicate: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_bloodra: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_blood_b: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_rupture: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_dual_breath_: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_ice_path_Lor: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_liquid_fire_: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_macropyre_Lo: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_sticky_nap: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flamebreak: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_firefly_Lo: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flaming_la: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_plasma_field_: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_static_link_L: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_unstable_curr: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_static: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_electr: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_crys: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_fros: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_bril: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_free: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_Lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tidebringer_: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_x_marks_the_: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ghostship_Lo: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_fatal_bonds: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_shadow_word: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_upheaval_Lo: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_rain_of_cha: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_arc_lightning_: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_lightning_bolt: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_static_field_L: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thundergods_wr: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_avalanche_Lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_Lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_Lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illusory_orb_L: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_waning_rift_Lo: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase_shift_Lo: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream_coil_Lor: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_poison_touch: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shallow_grav: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shadow_wave_: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_weave_Lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_battery_: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_power_co: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_rocket_f: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_hookshot: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_nova_Lor: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_armor_Lo: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain_frost_Lo: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_gush_Lor: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_kraken_s: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_anchor_s: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_ravage_L: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_ether: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_voodo: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_shack: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_mass_: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_malefice_Lor: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_demonic_conv: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_midnight_pul: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_black_hole_L: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_laser_Lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_heat_seeking: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_march_of_the: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rearm_Lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_shrapnel_Lor: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_headshot_Lor: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_take_aim_Lor: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_assassinate_: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_death_pul: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_heartstop: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_sadist_Lo: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_reapers_s: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_breat: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_drago: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_elder: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phantom_assassin_b: Blurring out to disappear from the enemy's sight.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sprint_Lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_slithereen_: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_bash_Lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_amplify_dam: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_wild_ax: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_inner_b: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_primal_: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_venomous: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_s: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_plague_w: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_n: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_time_: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_chron: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_blast_: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decrepify_Lor: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_ward_L: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_life_drain_Lo: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_purifica: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_repel_Lo: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_degen_au: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_guardian: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_L: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_storm_bolt_Lor: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_great_cleave_L: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcry_Lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_gods_strength_: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_frost_a: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_silence: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_truesho: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_marksma: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_poison_attack: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_nethertoxin_L: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_corrosive_ski: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_viper_strike_: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_vacuum_Lo: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_ion_shell: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_surge_Lor: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_wall_of_r: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_spell_block_: Roshan will block one targeted spell every 15 seconds. Also reduces status effects by 25%.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_bash_Descrip: Roshan has a chance to stun on attack.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_slam_Descrip: Roshan slams the ground, damaging and slowing all nearby enemies. Slam's damage will increase every minute.
DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_devotion_Des: Roshan possesses numerous protective abilities, including 55%% magic damage resistance, the ability to reduce damage from attacking illusions, and a scaling armor bonus that increases as time goes on.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_untouch: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_enchant: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_natures: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_impetus: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inner_vitali: While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_burning_spea: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_berserkers_b: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_life_break_L: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_void_: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_cripp: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_hunte: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_darkn: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spawn_s: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spin_we: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of forboding.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_incapac: Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_insatia: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the_swarm_Lo: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_shukuchi_Lor: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_geminate_att: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_L: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_penitence_Lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_of_faith_: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_persuasio: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_of_god_Lo: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_spectral_da: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_desolate_Lo: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_dispersion_: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_haunt_Lore: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_reality_Lor: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_devour: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_scorch: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_doom_L: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his attacks.
Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_acid_spra: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_unstable_: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_goblins_g: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_chemical_: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_carri: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_rage_L: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_feast_: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_open_w: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_silen: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_exorc: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_shuri: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_earthshock_Lor: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overpower_Lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_fury_swipes_Lo: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrage_Lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_char: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_empo: Aspiring heroes gain speed and power from simply observing the Spirit Breaker's dominance on the battle field.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_grea: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_neth: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_curse_of_t: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_glaives_of: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_last_word_: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_global_sil: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.
Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.

Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Destroyer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Destroyer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.
Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Permanent Invisibility, and level 4 wolves have Cripple.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_howl_Lore: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_howl_Descript: Strikes fear into enemies, reducing armor and attack damage to all enemies within %radius% range of Lycan and his wolves.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_feral_impulse: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.
Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_Lo: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_De: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal a critical strike doing %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_axe_culling_blade_: Axe releases a war cry, giving all nearby allies %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus movement and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% bonus attack speed
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_destroyer: After casting a spell, you have a chance to restore a percentage of your mana pool.
Locked away in an Astral Prison, cannot act or be acted upon.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ring_of_aquil: Mana regeneration increased by %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT_UNIQUE% and armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS_UNIQUE%.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_heavens_halberd_bu: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_heavens_halberd_de: Disarmed by Heaven's Halberd, cannot attack.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_troll_high_p: Provides bonus mana regeneration to all nearby allies.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyssal_blade_:
Active: Overwhelm

Stuns a target enemy unit for %stun_duration% seconds.

Pierces Spell Immunity.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.\n

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rod_of_atos_Lo: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heavens_halber:
Active: Disarm

Prevents a target from attacking for %disarm_melee% seconds on melee targets, and %disarm_range% seconds on ranged targets.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranquil_boots:
Passive: Break

Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus %bonus_health_regen% HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to %broken_movement_speed% for %break_time% seconds.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_aquila:
Passive: Aquila Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration and %aura_bonus_armor% armor to nearby allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%\n

Toggle: Aura

Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.
The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_strafe_Lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_searing_arro: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_wind_walk_Lo: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_death_pact_L: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: Gives %maim_chance%%% to cripple the target, causing %maim_damage% damage per second and lose %maim_attack_speed% Attack Speed for %maim_duration% seconds.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.
